ComicInfo.Title: 2 for the Road
ComicInfo.Summary:
THE RIDE: "2 For The Road" contains a pair of thrilling stories that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
In "SHOTGUN"
Eisner-Award Winning cover artist DAVE JOHNSON and acclaimed writer CHUCK DIXON jump on board with artist DOUG GREGORY for the story of an Air Force pilot hitching a ride back to base. He is picked up by a mysterious figure driving 'The Ride' with an agenda all his own. Don't miss the winding roads and twists and turns of "SHOTGUN."
"BIG PLANS"
CULLY HAMNER writes and illustrate "BIG PLANS"-- a tale of honor among thieves-- or the lack thereof. See what transpires when an 'old dog' needs one more job to retire in style, while a 'young gun' is determined to make sure that never happens!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-15 22:44:57. [CVDB412317]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Cully Hamner, Doug Alexander Gregory, Cully Hamner, Doug Alexander Gregory
ComicInfo.Inker: Cully Hamner, Doug Alexander Gregory, Cully Hamner, Doug Alexander Gregory
